title: Assassin's Creed Female Leads Repeatedly Scrapped - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.21.20
description:
Blessing and Imran breakdown a large report from Bloomberg about the culture at Ubisoft and how that's affected the Asassin's Creed franchise. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now on youtube.com/kindafunnygames, podcast services, and now Spotify! Thank you for your support!
Remember, it’s a huge Xbox week here on Kinda Funny:
Wednesday at 2 pm, Greg’s streaming the Summer Game Fest Demo Event -- he’ll be playing a bunch of the demos on Xbox LIVE.
Thursday at 9 am, we’re reacting LIVE to the Xbox Games Showcase alongside the Xcast host SnowBikeMike.
Thursday afternoon, Greg’s first playthrough of Halo: Combat Evolved starts with Tim and Andy on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Enough about Xbox, PSILY is live!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:01 - What the fuck is happening at Ubisoft? - Steven T. Wright @ Gamespot
00:21:00 -  Is it going to be enough that Ubisoft gives you just a choice to play as a woman? - Best Friends Q:Spencer Marie
00:24:30 - Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 2 Has Entered Full Development - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:30:32 - Xbox Game Pass on Switch may be less likely than we think - Brendan Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:38:30 - Rocket League Going Free to Play, Press Release
00:42:45 - Rap Artist, Logic, has signed a deal with Twitch - Wesley LeBlanc @ IGN
00:46:25 - ID@Xbox Summer Game Fest Demo Event is now LIVE - Jessica Ronnell @ news.xbox.com
00:48:45 -  KLARNA
01:01:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Andrea Rene
